name: Feedbackstr easyShare
author: spectos

sections.description:
Displaying your survey on your website has never been easier!
Feedbackstr easyShare is a free plugin which enables you to display and share a Feedbackstr survey on your WordPress page.are

Check our newest easyShare Blogpost Check it out!

Placing a Feedbackstr Sidetab on your website or inserting your survey via iFrame into articles or pages is done within a matter of clicks. In order to do so, click on the extra button we\’ve added to your Visual Editor and enter your survey\’s URL. That\’s it!

To use Feedbackstr easyShare, you need a Feedbackstr account. Find out more here: https://www.feedbackstr.com
sections.installation:
To install it, please follow these steps:

  1. Uncompress the download package
  2. Upload folder including all files and sub directories to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  4. Thats really all, have Fun! ðŸ™‚ .

More Information at Feedbackstr.com
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.3

  • Changed the Feedbackstr logo into the “Feedbackstr by Spectos” Logo
  • Changed preview image/s

Version 1.1.2

  • Bugfix CSS: The Checkbox in easyShare Dashboard now is hidden
  • Improve: CSS
  • Add Setting: Change Textcolor in tab via colorpicker
  • Remove: Registerbutton
  • Remove Setting: Tab position. From now on the sideTab exclusively on the left side

Version 1.0.1

  • Bugfix CSS, all Checkboxes in WordPress Admin are visible now.

Version 1.0.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: Integrate your Feedbackstr.com feedback tab or your entire survey into your Wordpress page and change all tab settings directly on the Wordpress admin …
